author: Sune Engel Rasmussen
title: Ordeal of Detained and Beaten Lebanese Actor Tests Public Faith in State
text:
BEIRUT—Undercover agents seized prominent Lebanese actor Ziad Itani in the parking lot of a theater in November and bundled him into a car.
What followed, Mr. Itani says, was a bout of torture. He was threatened with rape, hung from the ceiling in shackles and kicked in the face. Interrogators threatened to kill his daughter if he didn’t admit to spying for Israel, he said. 

Then,...
